sentences: Issues related to greenhouse gases, sectors and source categories, possible approaches targeting sectoral emissions, consideration of relevant methodological issues, and spillover effects were introduced in plenary on Thursday, 21 August, and discussed in a contact group on other issues chaired by AWG-KP Chair Dovland.
The contact group was convened in several sessions, as well as informal consultations and Friends of the Chair meetings throughout the week.
enb_long_title: Third session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Long-term Cooperative Action and first part of the sixth session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex 1 Parties under the Kyoto Protocol to the UNFCCC
